subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Miami Heat guard Dwyane Wade has been suspended for one game without pay by the N.B.A. for flailing his leg and making contact with the groin of the Charlotte Bobcats’ Ramon Sessions.
snippet: Miami Heat guard Dwyane Wade has been suspended for one game without pay by the N.B.A. for flailing his leg and making contact with the groin of the Charlotte Bobcats’ Ramon Sessions.
